MENU_PROMPT: 🍽️ What would you like to order today?
CONTACT_SUPPORT_FOR_UPDATES: To update your information, please contact support.
USER_INFO_NOT_FOUND: ❌ User information not found. Please restart the bot with /start
FAILED_ADD_TO_CART: ❌ Failed to add item to cart. Please try again.
CART_EMPTY_READY: 🛒 Your cart is empty Ready to add some delicious items? Browse our menu to get started!
FAILED_CLEAR_CART: ❌ Failed to clear cart. Please try again.
CART_EMPTY_CHECKOUT: 🛒 Your cart is empty Please add some items before checkout.
FAILED_SET_DELIVERY: ❌ Failed to set delivery method. Please try again.
NO_SAVED_ADDRESS: ❌ No saved address found. Please enter a new address.
FAILED_SAVE_ADDRESS: ❌ Failed to save delivery address. Please try again.
ORDER_CREATION_ERROR: ❌ Order Creation Error An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
ERROR_SHOWING_CONFIRMATION: ❌ Error showing order confirmation. Please try again.
CART_CLEARED_SUCCESS: 🗑️ Cart cleared successfully! Your cart is now empty.
INVALID_ADDRESS: ❌ Please enter a valid delivery address (at least 5 characters).
CART_WHAT_NEXT: What would you like to do next?
ORDER_CONFIRMED_SUCCESS: ✅ Order Confirmed! 📋 Order #{order_number} 💰 Total: ₪{order_total:.2f} Your order has been received and is being prepared. We'll notify you when it's ready! Thank you for choosing Samna Salta! 🇾🇪
CART_EMPTY_OR_ERROR: 🛒 Your cart is empty or an error occurred
CART_EMPTY_ORDER: 🛒 Your cart is empty. Add some delicious items first!
ORDER_SEND_PROBLEM: ❌ There was a problem sending your order. Please try again.
UNEXPECTED_ERROR: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again.
ORDER_CONFIRMATION_THANKS: Thank you for your order! We'll contact you soon to confirm the details.
CART_EMPTY_MESSAGE: Ready to add some delicious items? Browse our menu to get started!
CART_CLEARED: 🗑️ Your cart has been cleared successfully
WELCOME_BACK: 👋 Hello {name}, great to see you again! 🎉
WHAT_TO_ORDER_TODAY: What would you like to order today?
WELCOME_HELP_MESSAGE: I'm here to help you order our delicious traditional Yemeni products. Let's get started!
PLEASE_ENTER_NAME: To get started, please tell me your full name:
ERROR_TRY_START_AGAIN: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again with /start
NAME_TOO_SHORT: Please enter your full name (at least 2 characters):
PLEASE_SHARE_PHONE: Now, please share your phone number so we can contact you about your order:
SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please start again with /start
INFO_UPDATED: Your information has been updated successfully
HOW_RECEIVE_ORDER: How would you like to receive your order?
ENTER_VALID_PHONE: Please enter a valid phone number:
PICKUP_CHOSEN: Perfect! You chose pickup. We'll contact you to arrange a convenient pickup time.
WHAT_TO_ORDER: What would you like to order?
DELIVERY_CHOSEN: Great! You chose delivery. There's a delivery fee of 5 NIS.
PROVIDE_DELIVERY_ADDRESS: Please provide your full delivery address:
ADDRESS_TOO_SHORT: Please provide a complete delivery address (at least 10 characters):
DELIVERY_ADDRESS_SAVED: Thank you! Your delivery address has been saved successfully 🚚
ONBOARDING_CANCELLED: Registration cancelled. You can start again anytime with /start
UNKNOWN_COMMAND: Sorry, I didn't understand that command. Please follow the instructions provided.
UNKNOWN_MESSAGE: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Please provide the information I requested.
ADMIN_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
ADMIN_ORDER_ID_PROMPT: Please enter the order ID or order number:
ADMIN_ORDER_ID_NOT_FOUND: ❌ Order not found. Please try again:
ADMIN_ORDER_ID_TRY_ANOTHER: ❌ Could not find order details. Please try another ID:
ADMIN_NO_PENDING_ORDERS: ✅ No pending orders at the moment.
ADMIN_NO_ACTIVE_ORDERS: ✅ No active orders at the moment.
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_INSTRUCTIONS: Please provide the product details in the following format: Name: Product Name Description: Product description Category: Product category Price: 25.00 Example: Name: New Kubaneh Description: Special edition kubaneh Category: bread Price: 30.00
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_STEP_NAME: 📝 Step 1: Product Name Please enter the product name:
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_STEP_DESCRIPTION: 📄 Step 2: Product Description Product: {name} Please enter the product description:
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_STEP_CATEGORY: 📂 Step 3: Product Category Product: {name} Description: {description} Please select a category:
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_NAME_TOO_SHORT: ❌ Product name is too short. Please enter a name with at least 2 characters.
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_TOO_SHORT: ❌ Product description is too short. Please enter a description with at least 5 characters.
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_PRICE_INVALID: ❌ Invalid price format. Please enter a valid number (e.g., 25.00).
ADMIN_ADD_PRODUCT_PRICE_TOO_LOW: ❌ Price must be at least ₪0.01. Please enter a valid price.
ADMIN_EDIT_PRODUCT_INSTRUCTIONS: Please provide the updated product details in the following format: Name: New Product Name Description: New description Category: New category Price: 25.00 Status: active Leave fields unchanged by omitting them.
ADMIN_DELETE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS: ✅ Product Deactivated Successfully! Product '{name}' has been deactivated and will no longer appear in the customer menu.
ADMIN_SEARCH_PRODUCTS_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter a search term (minimum 2 characters):
ADMIN_PRODUCT_INVALID_INPUT: ❌ Invalid input format. Please follow the instructions.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_NAME_TOO_SHORT: ❌ Product name must be at least 2 characters long.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_PRICE_INVALID: ❌ Price must be a valid number greater than 0.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TOO_SHORT: ❌ Category must be at least 2 characters long.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_ALREADY_EXISTS: ❌ A product with this name already exists.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_UPDATE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please provide the updated product details. You can update individual fields: Name: New Name Description: New Description Category: New Category Price: 25.00 Status: active/inactive
ADMIN_PRODUCT_UPDATE_NO_CHANGES: ℹ️ No changes were made to the product.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_UPDATE_INVALID_PRICE: ❌ Invalid price format. Use a number (e.g., 25.00).
ADMIN_PRODUCT_CREATE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please provide the product details in the following format: Name: Product Name Description: Product description Category: Product category Price: 25.00 Example: Name: Special Kubaneh Description: Handmade traditional kubaneh Category: bread Price: 30.00
ADMIN_PRODUCT_DELETE_SUCCESS: ✅ Product Deactivated Successfully! Product '{name}' has been deactivated and will no longer appear in the customer menu.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_SEARCH_MIN_LENGTH: Please enter at least 2 characters to search.
ADMIN_PRODUCT_SEARCH_NO_RESULTS: No products found matching your search.
ADMIN_CATEGORY_ADD_PROMPT: 📂 Add New Category Please enter the name for the new category:
ADMIN_CATEGORY_NAME_TOO_SHORT: ❌ Category name must be at least 2 characters long.
ADMIN_CATEGORY_EDIT_NAME_PROMPT: ✏️ Edit Category Name Current category: {category} Please enter the new name:
ADMIN_CATEGORY_DELETE_CONFIRM: 🗑️ Delete Category Are you sure you want to delete the category '{category}'? ⚠️ This will deactivate all products in this category!
ADMIN_CATEGORY_DELETE_WITH_PRODUCTS: 🗑️ Delete Category Are you sure you want to delete the category '{category}'? ⚠️ This will deactivate {count} products in this category!
ANALYTICS_NO_DATA: No data available for the selected period.
ORDER_STATUS_CONFIRMED: ✅ Order Confirmed! Your order has been confirmed and is being prepared with care. We'll notify you when it's ready!
ORDER_STATUS_PREPARING: 👨‍🍳 Order in Preparation! Your order is being prepared with love and attention. It won't be long now!
ORDER_STATUS_READY: 🎉 Order Ready! Your order is ready for pickup/delivery!
ORDER_STATUS_DELIVERED: 🚚 Order Delivered! Your order has been delivered successfully. Enjoy your delicious meal!
ORDER_STATUS_CANCELLED: ❌ Order Cancelled Your order has been cancelled. Please contact us if you have any questions.
ORDER_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Your order status has been updated to: {status}
DELIVERY_READY_INFO: 🚚 Delivery Information: Your order is on its way! Please ensure someone is available to receive it.
PICKUP_READY_INFO: 🏪 Pickup Information: 📍 Location: Samna Salta Restaurant ⏰ Hours: Wednesday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Please bring your order number when collecting.
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_CLASSIC: Classic Kubaneh - Traditional rich Yemeni bread
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_SEEDED: Seeded Kubaneh - Yemeni bread with sesame and cumin seeds
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_HERB: Herb Kubaneh - Yemeni bread with aromatic herbs
PRODUCT_KUBANEH_AROMATIC: Aromatic Kubaneh - Yemeni bread with special spices
PRODUCT_SAMNEH_SMOKED: Smoked Samneh - Clarified butter with rich smoky flavor
PRODUCT_SAMNEH_NOT_SMOKED: Not Smoked Samneh - Pure and natural clarified butter
PRODUCT_RED_BISBAS: Red Bisbas - Traditional Yemeni spicy sauce
PRODUCT_HILBEH: Hilbeh - Traditional Yemeni sauce from fenugreek seeds
PRODUCT_HAWAIJ_SOUP: Hawaij for Soup - Yemeni spice blend for soup
PRODUCT_HAWAIJ_COFFEE: Hawaij for Coffee - Yemeni spice blend for coffee
PRODUCT_WHITE_COFFEE: White Coffee - Traditional Yemeni hot and sweet drink
KUBANEH_DESC: 🍞 Kubaneh Choose your preferred kubaneh type: • Classic - Traditional rich Yemeni bread • Seeded - With sesame and cumin seeds • Herb - With aromatic herbs • Aromatic - With special spices Price: 25 ₪ per unit
SAMNEH_DESC: 🧈 Samneh Choose your preferred samneh type: • Smoked - Rich smoky flavor • Not Smoked - Pure and natural Price: 15 ₪
RED_BISBAS_DESC: 🌶️ Red Bisbas Traditional Yemeni spicy sauce - perfect for adding heat to your dishes! Price: 12 ₪
HILBEH_DESC_AVAILABLE: 🌿 Hilbeh Traditional Yemeni fenugreek sauce - a unique and tasty addition to your meal! Available today! ✅ Price: 18 ₪
HAWAIJ_SOUP_DESC: 🥘 Hawaij for Soup Perfect Yemeni spice blend for soups and stews - adds authentic flavor! Price: 8 ₪
HAWAIJ_COFFEE_DESC: ☕ Hawaij for Coffee Yemeni spice blend for coffee - transforms your coffee experience! Price: 8 ₪
WHITE_COFFEE_DESC: ☕ White Coffee Traditional Yemeni caffeine-free drink - hot, sweet, and comforting! Price: 10 ₪

HELP_MENU_CONTENT: Need help with your order? Here are some common questions: • How to order: Browse our menu, add items to cart, and checkout • Delivery: We offer pickup (free) and delivery (+5₪) • Payment: Cash on delivery/pickup • Contact: Use /start to restart or contact support For additional help, please contact our support team.
SUPPORT_MESSAGE: 📞 Contact Support For immediate assistance, please contact us: 📱 Phone: [Your phone number] 📧 Email: [Your email] ⏰ Hours: Wednesday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM We'll get back to you as soon as possible!
